Wild bootstrapped p-values in column 3 have been computed using the command boottest in Stata (Roodman et al. 2019). P-values in columns 4 have been computed from the effective number of clusters using the command clusteff in Stata (Lee and Steigerwald 2018). The estimates in column 5 are unweighted. The estimates in columns 6-7 have been obtained using replication weights as described by IPUMS (https://usa.ipums.org/usa/repwt.shtml). Same fixed effects, individual and state controls as Table 2. Source: ACS 2008-2012 (excluding 2010). * p < 0.10, ** p < 0.05, *** p < 0.01  Table B4: Effect of ACA on health insurance among same-sex couples. Additional extensions.
